name: VSM Blazor WebAssembly
postCreateCommand: dotnet restore simulation_management.sln && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
